contexts.context: ...beneath his fingers, he softly sang an old dirty tavern <mark>song</mark> about the Ninety-Nine Loves of Boethiah. He said...
The <mark>song</mark> returned, and Sathis heard the vault door in his study...
...Cantatas of Vivec are gospels written in the form of epic <mark>songs</mark>. They trace the evolution of Vivec from a foolish mortal...
